=================================
Purchase Procurement Run Buy Hook
=================================

This module adds hooks to method '_run_buy' of model 'procurement.rule'. The
currently supported hooks are:

* Allow to add more data to an existing purchase order line, when a
  procurement is extending it.


Usage
=====


.. image:: https://odoo-community.org/website/image/ir.attachment/5784_f2813bd/datas
   :alt: Try me on Runbot
   :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/142/11.0


Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues
<https://github.com/OCA/purchase-workflow/issues>`_. In case of
trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you
spotted it first, help us smash it by providing detailed and welcomed feedback.


Credits
=======

Contributors

* Jordi Ballester <jordi.ballester@eficent.com>.
